sen.j: 道歌（どうか）は、芸術である短歌とは違って、仏教の教えや禅僧が悟りや修業の要点をわかりやすく詠み込んだ短歌や和歌をのこと。
sen.e: In contrast to tanka poetry as art, doka (literally, poetry on the way) refers to tanka or waka poems that include Buddhist teachings or that Zen monks composed to make study and spiritual enlightenment easier to understand.
